lead_paragraph: Sanya Richards beat the Olympic 400-meter champion Christine Ohuruogu at the World Athletics Final in Stuttgart, Germany, handing Ohuruogu her only defeat of the year. Richards finished in 50.41 seconds, ahead of Ohuruogu’s 50.83.
snippet: Sanya Richards beat the Olympic 400-meter champion Christine Ohuruogu at the World Athletics Final in Stuttgart, Germany, handing Ohuruogu her only defeat of the year. Richards finished in 50.41 seconds, ahead of Ohuruogu’s 50.83.
